refnamediv.refpurpose: Node and interface description data structures

refsect1.title: Object Hierarchy
refsect1.screen: GBoxed ├── GDBusAnnotationInfo ├── GDBusArgInfo ├── GDBusInterfaceInfo ├── GDBusMethodInfo ├── GDBusNodeInfo ├── GDBusPropertyInfo ╰── GDBusSignalInfo GFlags ╰── GDBusPropertyInfoFlags

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Various data structures and convenience routines to parse and generate D-Bus introspection XML. Introspection information is used when registering objects with g_dbus_connection_register_object().
The format of D-Bus introspection XML is specified in the D-Bus specification

refsect2.title: g_dbus_annotation_info_lookup ()
refsect2.para: Looks up the value of an annotation.
The cost of this function is O(n) in number of annotations.

entry.para: A NULL-terminated array of annotations or NULL.
The name of the annotation to look up.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The value or NULL if not found. Do not free, it is owned by annotations .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_interface_info_lookup_method ()
refsect2.para: Looks up information about a method.
The cost of this function is O(n) in number of methods unless g_dbus_interface_info_cache_build() has been used on info .

entry.para: A D-Bus method name (typically in CamelCase)

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GDBusMethodInfo or NULL if not found. Do not free, it is owned by info .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_interface_info_lookup_signal ()
refsect2.para: Looks up information about a signal.
The cost of this function is O(n) in number of signals unless g_dbus_interface_info_cache_build() has been used on info .

entry.para: A D-Bus signal name (typically in CamelCase)

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GDBusSignalInfo or NULL if not found. Do not free, it is owned by info .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_interface_info_lookup_property ()
refsect2.para: Looks up information about a property.
The cost of this function is O(n) in number of properties unless g_dbus_interface_info_cache_build() has been used on info .

entry.para: A D-Bus property name (typically in CamelCase).

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GDBusPropertyInfo or NULL if not found. Do not free, it is owned by info .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_interface_info_cache_build ()
refsect2.para: Builds a lookup-cache to speed up g_dbus_interface_info_lookup_method(), g_dbus_interface_info_lookup_signal() and g_dbus_interface_info_lookup_property().
If this has already been called with info , the existing cache is used and its use count is increased.
Note that info cannot be modified until g_dbus_interface_info_cache_release() is called.
Since: 2.30

refsect2.title: g_dbus_interface_info_cache_release ()
refsect2.para: Decrements the usage count for the cache for info built by g_dbus_interface_info_cache_build() (if any) and frees the resources used by the cache if the usage count drops to zero.
Since: 2.30

refsect2.title: g_dbus_interface_info_generate_xml ()
refsect2.para: Appends an XML representation of info (and its children) to string_builder .
This function is typically used for generating introspection XML documents at run-time for handling the org.freedesktop.DBus.Introspectable.Introspect method.

entry.para: A GString to to append XML data to.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_node_info_new_for_xml ()
refsect2.para: Parses xml_data and returns a GDBusNodeInfo representing the data.
The introspection XML must contain exactly one top-level <node> element.
Note that this routine is using a GMarkup-based parser that only accepts a subset of valid XML documents.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GDBusNodeInfo structure or NULL if error is set. Free with g_dbus_node_info_unref().

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_node_info_lookup_interface ()
refsect2.para: Looks up information about an interface.
The cost of this function is O(n) in number of interfaces.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GDBusInterfaceInfo or NULL if not found. Do not free, it is owned by info .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_node_info_generate_xml ()
refsect2.para: Appends an XML representation of info (and its children) to string_builder .
This function is typically used for generating introspection XML documents at run-time for handling the org.freedesktop.DBus.Introspectable.Introspect method.

entry.para: A GString to to append XML data to.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_node_info_ref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated does nothing. Otherwise increases the reference count.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_interface_info_ref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated does nothing. Otherwise increases the reference count.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_info_ref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated does nothing. Otherwise increases the reference count.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_signal_info_ref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated does nothing. Otherwise increases the reference count.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_property_info_ref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated does nothing. Otherwise increases the reference count.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_arg_info_ref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated does nothing. Otherwise increases the reference count.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_annotation_info_ref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated does nothing. Otherwise increases the reference count.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_node_info_unref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated, does nothing. Otherwise decreases the reference count of info . When its reference count drops to 0, the memory used is freed.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_interface_info_unref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated, does nothing. Otherwise decreases the reference count of info . When its reference count drops to 0, the memory used is freed.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_info_unref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated, does nothing. Otherwise decreases the reference count of info . When its reference count drops to 0, the memory used is freed.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_signal_info_unref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated, does nothing. Otherwise decreases the reference count of info . When its reference count drops to 0, the memory used is freed.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_property_info_unref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated, does nothing. Otherwise decreases the reference count of info . When its reference count drops to 0, the memory used is freed.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_arg_info_unref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated, does nothing. Otherwise decreases the reference count of info . When its reference count drops to 0, the memory used is freed.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_annotation_info_unref ()
refsect2.para: If info is statically allocated, does nothing. Otherwise decreases the reference count of info . When its reference count drops to 0, the memory used is freed.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: GDBusAnnotationInfo
refsect2.para: Information about an annotation.

entry.para: The reference count or -1 if statically allocated.
The name of the annotation, e.g. "org.freedesktop.DBus.Deprecated".
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusAnnotationInfo structures or NULL if there are no annotations.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: GDBusArgInfo
refsect2.para: Information about an argument for a method or a signal.

entry.para: The reference count or -1 if statically allocated.
Name of the argument, e.g. unix_user_id .
D-Bus signature of the argument (a single complete type).
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusAnnotationInfo structures or NULL if there are no annotations.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: GDBusMethodInfo
refsect2.para: Information about a method on an D-Bus interface.

entry.para: The reference count or -1 if statically allocated.
The name of the D-Bus method, e.g. RequestName .
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusArgInfo structures or NULL if there are no in arguments.
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusArgInfo structures or NULL if there are no out arguments.
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusAnnotationInfo structures or NULL if there are no annotations.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: GDBusSignalInfo
refsect2.para: Information about a signal on a D-Bus interface.

entry.para: The reference count or -1 if statically allocated.
The name of the D-Bus signal, e.g. "NameOwnerChanged".
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusArgInfo structures or NULL if there are no arguments.
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusAnnotationInfo structures or NULL if there are no annotations.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: enum GDBusPropertyInfoFlags
refsect2.para: Flags describing the access control of a D-Bus property.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: GDBusPropertyInfo
refsect2.para: Information about a D-Bus property on a D-Bus interface.

entry.para: The reference count or -1 if statically allocated.
The name of the D-Bus property, e.g. "SupportedFilesystems".
The D-Bus signature of the property (a single complete type).
Access control flags for the property.
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusAnnotationInfo structures or NULL if there are no annotations.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: GDBusInterfaceInfo
refsect2.para: Information about a D-Bus interface.

entry.para: The reference count or -1 if statically allocated.
The name of the D-Bus interface, e.g. "org.freedesktop.DBus.Properties".
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusMethodInfo structures or NULL if there are no methods.
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusSignalInfo structures or NULL if there are no signals.
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusPropertyInfo structures or NULL if there are no properties.
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusAnnotationInfo structures or NULL if there are no annotations.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: GDBusNodeInfo
refsect2.para: Information about nodes in a remote object hierarchy.

entry.para: The reference count or -1 if statically allocated.
The path of the node or NULL if omitted. Note that this may be a relative path. See the D-Bus specification for more details.
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusInterfaceInfo structures or NULL if there are no interfaces.
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusNodeInfo structures or NULL if there are no nodes.
A pointer to a NULL-terminated array of pointers to GDBusAnnotationInfo structures or NULL if there are no annotations.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_DBUS_NODE_INFO
refsect2.para: The GType for a boxed type holding a GDBusNodeInfo.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_DBUS_INTERFACE_INFO
refsect2.para: The GType for a boxed type holding a GDBusInterfaceInfo.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.para: The GType for a boxed type holding a GDBusMethodInfo.

Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_DBUS_PROPERTY_INFO
refsect2.para: The GType for a boxed type holding a GDBusPropertyInfo.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_DBUS_ARG_INFO
refsect2.para: The GType for a boxed type holding a GDBusArgInfo.
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_DBUS_ANNOTATION_INFO
refsect2.para: The GType for a boxed type holding a GDBusAnnotationInfo.
Since: 2.26
